item.description:
Debate Update: Don't worry about this meeting running into the debate. We should be done at around 8pm.. The debate starts at 9pm.

Join the Sierra Club at our annual Political Gossip Night to discuss what's going on locally and nationally! We'll have some information about some of the campaigns and candidates, and lots of opportunities to get involved with local, regional, and national campaigns. There will also be folks from NH explaining how to get involved in one of the most important swing states in the USA. Everyone is welcome - bring your friends! This is a free event.

Note: The Luna Cafe serves coffee, tea, gelati, as well as wine, beer, delicious soups, sandwiches, and pastries. They're just a few blocks from the Central Square stop on the Red Line.

There's also a public parking lot behind the cafe. See http://tinyurl.com/4f... for a map.

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Sierra Club button and nametag

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club's Annual Political Gossip Night - Debate Update
